column2: Mighty Jaffar lies dead once again. For how long, no one knows for certain...
Most would say that parting children from their mother is a cruel act. Not so much with Skattach and her Fimir though.
Twice a ruler, twice a failure. Prince Fatandira has learnt the hard way that the crown will never be her destiny.
Whether he was defeated by an enemy or turned against by his own Djinn slaves is unknown, but the Golden Magus will no longer pester the sea with his cruel petulance and eccentricity.
